title: Your Very First SCP!
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:info:start]]
**Article:** Your Very First SCP!
**Author:** [[*user the great hippo]]
**Images:** Made by me, using public domain resources.

**Music:** [https://youtu.be/EddX9hnhDS4 I Have No Mouth And I Must Scream] (AM's Hate Speech)
----
[[include :scpsandbox2:hippo]]
[[include :scp-wiki:info:more]]
[[include :scp-wiki:info:end]]

[[module CSS]]
import url(/component:scp-pride/code/1);
[[/module]]

[[module css]]
sup { 
vertical-align: top; position: relative; top: -0.5em; 
}
[[/module]]

[[module css]]
.text-box {background-color: white; color: black; float: center; border: solid 1px #000000; padding: 5px 15px 5px 15px; box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2); margin: 0% 4% 0% 4%}
[[/module]]

[[module css]]
.outer-chat {background: gray; padding: 1px 15px; border: solid 3px lightgray; margin: 10px; border-radius: 30px 15px}
[[/module]]

[[module css]]
.inner-chat {background: white; padding: 1px 15px; border: solid 3px lightgray; margin: 10px; border-radius: 30px 15px}
[[/module]]

[[module CSS]]
.blinkbar {color: blue; animation: blink 1.5s infinite; letter-spacing: -0.13em;}@keyframes blink{to{opacity: .0;}}@keyframes flicker {0% {opacity: 0.9890; }5% {opacity: 0.5842; }10% {opacity: 0.9865; }20% {opacity: 0.0412; }20% {opacity: 0.6255; }25% {opacity: 0.3157; }30% {opacity: 0.7328; }35% {opacity: 0.4654; }40% {opacity: 0.9128; }45% {opacity: 0.2449; }50% {opacity: 0.5485; }55% {opacity: 0.6438; }60% {opacity: 0.1180; }65% {opacity: 0.9085; }70% {opacity: 0.0266; }75% {opacity: 0.6795; }80% {opacity: 0.7812; }85% {opacity: 0.0117; }90% {opacity: 0.2239; }95% {opacity: 0.8897; }100% {opacity: 0.2260; }}@keyframes overlay-anim {0% {visibility: hidden; }10% {visibility: hidden; }11% {visibility: visible; }50% {visibility: hidden; }100% {visibility: hidden; }}
[[/module]]

[[div style="background-color: black; color: white; float: center; border: solid 1px #000000; padding: 5px 15px 5px 15px; box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2); margin: 0% 4% 0% 4%"]]
[[size 80%]]###008aff|Ver 7.0.10487##
###008aff|Department of Analytics (2018)##

[[/size]]
[[=]]
[[=image logo.gif]]
++ ##white|Starting Tabula OS##

S###008aff|ecure.## C###008aff|ontain.##
P###008aff|rotect.##

@@ @@

@@ @@

@@ @@

@@ @@

@@ @@

@@ @@

@@ @@

@@ @@

@@ @@

@@ @@

@@ @@


[[/=]]
@@ Loading document editor...@@
[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[div style="background-color: black; color: white; float: center; border: solid 1px #000000; padding: 5px 15px 5px 15px; box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2); margin: 0% 4% 0% 4%"]]
@@ Editor loaded.@@
[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[div class="text-box"]]
[[span class="blinkbar"]]_[[/span]]

@@ @@

@@ @@

[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[div class="text-box"]]
it[[span class="blinkbar"]]_[[/span]]

@@ @@

@@ @@

[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[div class="text-box"]]
item [[span class="blinkbar"]]_[[/span]]

@@ @@

@@ @@

[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[div class="text-box"]]
item #: [[span class="blinkbar"]]_[[/span]]

@@ @@

@@ @@

[[div class="outer-chat"]]
[[div class="inner-chat"]]
[[table style="border: none; width: 100%"]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="width: 20%;"]]
[[f<image skippy.png size="thumbnail"]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; background-color: white; color: black; padding: 1% 1% 1% 1%"]]
Hello, friend! ~:o) I'm Skippy, your automated SCP helper! It looks like you're having some trouble. May I be of assistance?
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]

[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[div class="text-box"]]
item #: scp[[span class="blinkbar"]]_[[/span]]

@@ @@

@@ @@

[[div class="outer-chat"]]
[[div class="inner-chat"]]
[[table style="border: none; width: 100%"]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="width: 20%;"]]
[[f<image skippy.png size="thumbnail"]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; background-color: white; color: black; padding: 1% 1% 1% 1%"]]
Hm! If this is your first SCP, might I suggest you review your site's [[[how-to-write-an-scp|tutorial]]] before proceeding? 
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]

[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[div class="text-box"]]
item #: scp XX[[span class="blinkbar"]]_[[/span]]

@@ @@

@@ @@

[[div class="outer-chat"]]
[[div class="inner-chat"]]
[[table style="border: none; width: 100%"]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="width: 20%;"]]
[[f<image skippy.png size="thumbnail"]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; background-color: white; color: black; padding: 1% 1% 1% 1%"]]
Also, rather than //directly// posting your article to the IntSCPFN server, perhaps you should write a draft on the local [[[sandbox]]] and provide a link to your site's [/forum/c-50864/help:drafts-and-critiques peer review forum]?
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]

[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[div class="text-box"]]
[[span style="background-color: #ffc2b3;"]]item #: scp XXXX[[/span]]
[[span class="blinkbar"]]_[[/span]]

@@ @@

@@ @@

[[div class="outer-chat"]]
[[div class="inner-chat"]]
[[table style="border: none; width: 100%"]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="width: 20%;"]]
[[f<image skippy.png size="thumbnail"]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; background-color: white; color: black; padding: 1% 1% 1% 1%"]]
No? You want to post this article to the mainlist immediately? 

Okay then, friend! I'm here to help! It looks like you've made some basic formatting errors, though. Let's just fix those up for you! 
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]

[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[div class="text-box"]]
##blue|**Item #:** SCP-##XXXX
obje[[span class="blinkbar"]]_[[/span]]

@@ @@

@@ @@

[[div class="outer-chat"]]
[[div class="inner-chat"]]
[[table style="border: none; width: 100%"]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="width: 20%;"]]
[[f<image skippy.png size="thumbnail"]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; background-color: white; color: black; padding: 1% 1% 1% 1%"]]
There we go! I've bolded '**Item #:**' (just enclose text in double-asterisks to bold it; for example: @@**Item #:**@@) and corrected the capitalization issues. I also added a dash between 'SCP' and the designation!
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]

[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[div class="text-box"]]
**Item #:** SCP-XXXX
###ffc2b3|█##
object class[[span class="blinkbar"]]_[[/span]]

@@ @@

@@ @@

[[div class="outer-chat"]]
[[div class="inner-chat"]]
[[table style="border: none; width: 100%"]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="width: 20%;"]]
[[f<image skippy.png size="thumbnail"]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; background-color: white; color: black; padding: 1% 1% 1% 1%"]]
Remember, friend: There should be two line breaks (a full 'space') between each heading!
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]

[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[div class="text-box"]]
**Item #:** SCP-XXXX

##blue|**Object Class:**## Unkno[[span class="blinkbar"]]_[[/span]]

@@ @@

@@ @@

[[div class="outer-chat"]]
[[div class="inner-chat"]]
[[table style="border: none; width: 100%"]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="width: 20%;"]]
[[f<image skippy.png size="thumbnail"]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; background-color: white; color: black; padding: 1% 1% 1% 1%"]]
Let me take care of the rest of this formatting for you! Remember, capitalize each word of a heading ('**I**tem', '**O**bject **C**lass', etc)!
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]

[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[/div]]


@@ @@

[[div class="text-box"]]
**Item #:** SCP-XXXX

**Object Class:** [[span style="background-color: #ffc2b3;"]]Unknown[[/span]]
[[span class="blinkbar"]]_[[/span]]

@@ @@

@@ @@

[[div class="outer-chat"]]
[[div class="inner-chat"]]
[[table style="border: none; width: 100%"]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="width: 20%;"]]
[[f<image skippy.png size="thumbnail"]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; background-color: white; color: black; padding: 1% 1% 1% 1%"]]
Hm. It looks like you're trying to use an //Esoteric Object Class//. Might I suggest you select one of the //Standard Object Classes//?
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]

[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[/div]]


@@ @@

[[div class="text-box"]]
**Item #:** SCP-XXXX

**Object Class:** [[span style="background-color: #ffc2b3;"]]Unknown[[/span]]

**Special Conta[[span class="blinkbar"]]_[[/span]]

@@ @@

@@ @@

[[div class="outer-chat"]]
[[div class="inner-chat"]]
[[table style="border: none; width: 100%"]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="width: 20%;"]]
[[f<image skippy.png size="thumbnail"]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; background-color: white; color: black; padding: 1% 1% 1% 1%"]]To determine which Object Class your anomaly falls under, you can apply the 'Locked Box Test'. If the anomaly were locked in a box, would it be contained?

* If yes, the anomaly is **Safe**. 
* If yes (but it would need to be checked on), the anomaly is **Euclid**.
* If not, the anomaly is **Keter**.
* If the anomaly //itself// is used to contain other anomalies (or otherwise help the Foundation), the anomaly is **Thaumiel**.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]

[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[/div]]


@@ @@

[[div class="text-box"]]
**Item #:** SCP-XXXX

**Object Class:** [[span style="background-color: #008aff; color: white"]]Unknown@@ @@[[/span]]

@@**Special Conta@@

@@ @@

@@ @@

[[div class="outer-chat"]]
[[div class="inner-chat"]]
[[table style="border: none; width: 100%"]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="width: 20%;"]]
[[f<image skippy.png size="thumbnail"]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; background-color: white; color: black; padding: 1% 1% 1% 1%"]]Two alternative classes are **Neutralized** and **Explained**. **Neutralized** refers to anomalies which are no longer active; **Explained** is for anomalies which were never anomalous at all!
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]

[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[div class="text-box"]]
**Item #:** SCP-XXXX

**Object Class:** [[span class="blinkbar"]]_[[/span]]

@@**Special Conta@@

@@ @@

@@ @@

[[div class="outer-chat"]]
[[div class="inner-chat"]]
[[table style="border: none; width: 100%"]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="width: 20%;"]]
[[f<image skippy.png size="thumbnail"]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; background-color: white; color: black; padding: 1% 1% 1% 1%"]]
SCPs which are **Explained** have -EX added to them as a post-fix -- examples of this include **[[[SCP-3000-EX]]]** and **[[[SCP-1763-EX]]]**. 
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]

[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[div class="text-box"]]
**Item #:** SCP-XXXX

**Object Class:** Apol[[span class="blinkbar"]]_[[/span]]

@@**Special Conta@@

@@ @@

@@ @@

[[div class="outer-chat"]]
[[div class="inner-chat"]]
[[table style="border: none; width: 100%"]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="width: 20%;"]]
[[f<image skippy.png size="thumbnail"]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; background-color: white; color: black; padding: 1% 1% 1% 1%"]]
**Explained** anomalies are maintained on a list separate from the IntSCPFN mainlist, which you can find [[[scp-ex|here]]]. They're -- 
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]

[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[/div]]


@@ @@

[[div class="text-box"]]
**Item #:** SCP-XXXX

**Object Class:** Apollyon[[span class="blinkbar"]]_[[/span]]

@@**Special Conta@@

@@ @@

@@ @@

[[div class="outer-chat"]]
[[div class="inner-chat"]]
[[table style="border: none; width: 100%"]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="width: 20%;"]]
[[f<image skippy.png size="thumbnail"]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; background-color: white; color: black; padding: 1% 1% 1% 1%"]]
@@. . .@@
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]

[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[div class="text-box"]]
**Item #:** SCP-XXXX

**Object Class:** --[[span style="background-color: #ffc2b3;"]]Apollyon[[/span]]--

@@**Special Containment Proc@@[[span class="blinkbar"]]_[[/span]]

@@ @@

@@ @@

[[div class="outer-chat"]]
[[div class="inner-chat"]]
[[table style="border: none; width: 100%"]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="width: 20%;"]]
[[f<image skippy.png size="thumbnail"]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; background-color: white; color: black; padding: 1% 1% 1% 1%"]]
Let me just fix that for you, friend!
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]

[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[div class="text-box"]]
**Item #:** SCP-XXXX

**Object Class:** [[span style="background-color: #ffc2b3;"]]##blue|Keter##[[/span]]

**Special Containment Procedures:** [[span class="blinkbar"]]_[[/span]]

@@ @@

@@ @@

[[div class="outer-chat"]]
[[div class="inner-chat"]]
[[table style="border: none; width: 100%"]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="width: 20%;"]]
[[f<image skippy.png size="thumbnail"]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; background-color: white; color: black; padding: 1% 1% 1% 1%"]]
There we go!
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]

[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[/div]]


@@ @@

[[div class="text-box"]]
**Item #:** SCP-XXXX

**Object Class:** Keter

**Special Containment Procedures:** SCP-XXXX must be[[span class="blinkbar"]]_[[/span]]

@@ @@

@@ @@

[[div class="outer-chat"]]
[[div class="inner-chat"]]
[[table style="border: none; width: 100%"]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="width: 20%;"]]
[[f<image skippy.png size="thumbnail"]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; background-color: white; color: black; padding: 1% 1% 1% 1%"]]
@@. . .@@
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]

[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[div class="text-box"]]
**Item #:** SCP-XXXX

**Object Class:** Keter

**Special Containment Procedures:** [[span style="background-color: #ffc2b3;"]]SCP-XXXX must be found and destroyed.[[/span]]
[[span class="blinkbar"]]_[[/span]]

@@ @@

@@ @@

[[div class="outer-chat"]]
[[div class="inner-chat"]]
[[table style="border: none; width: 100%"]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="width: 20%;"]]
[[f<image skippy.png size="thumbnail"]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; background-color: white; color: black; padding: 1% 1% 1% 1%"]]
It looks like you're having some problems with your containment procedures, chum! May I make a few suggestions?
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]

[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[div class="text-box"]]
**Item #:** SCP-XXXX

**Object Class:** Keter

**Special Containment Procedures:** [[span style="background-color: #ffc2b3;"]]--SCP-XXXX must be found and destroyed.--[[/span]][[span class="blinkbar"]]_[[/span]]

@@ @@

@@ @@

[[div class="outer-chat"]]
[[div class="inner-chat"]]
[[table style="border: none; width: 100%"]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="width: 20%;"]]
[[f<image skippy.png size="thumbnail"]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; background-color: white; color: black; padding: 1% 1% 1% 1%"]]
A few things to note about containment procedures:
* The Foundation typically does not //destroy// anomalies; it merely //contains// them.
* Procedures are written as things which either currently //are// being done or //are **to be** done// ("object //is// kept in a cell" or "object //is **to be**// kept in a cell"). 'Must', 'shall be', 'should', or 'would' are typically not used.
* Procedures should be brief, clear, and succinct -- but interesting enough to be memorable.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]

[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[div class="text-box"]]
**Item #:** SCP-XXXX

**Object Class:** Keter

**Special Containment Procedures:** SCP-XXXX is to be found[[span class="blinkbar"]]_[[/span]]

@@ @@

@@ @@

[[div class="outer-chat"]]
[[div class="inner-chat"]]
[[table style="border: none; width: 100%"]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="width: 20%;"]]
[[f<image skippy.png size="thumbnail"]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; background-color: white; color: black; padding: 1% 1% 1% 1%"]]
There you go, friend!
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]

[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[/div]]

@@ @@


[[div class="text-box"]]
**Item #:** SCP-XXXX

**Object Class:** Keter

**Special Containment Procedures:** SCP-XXXX is to be found, then contained inside a 10x10x10[[span class="blinkbar"]]_[[/span]]

@@ @@

@@ @@

[[div class="outer-chat"]]
[[div class="inner-chat"]]
[[table style="border: none; width: 100%"]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="width: 20%;"]]
[[f<image skippy.png size="thumbnail"]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; background-color: white; color: black; padding: 1% 1% 1% 1%"]]
@@. . .@@
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]

[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[div class="text-box"]]
**Item #:** SCP-XXXX

**Object Class:** Keter

**Special Containment Procedures:** SCP-XXXX is to be found, then contained inside a 10x10x10 foot cell[[span class="blinkbar"]]_[[/span]]

@@ @@

@@ @@

[[div class="outer-chat"]]
[[div class="inner-chat"]]
[[table style="border: none; width: 100%"]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="width: 20%;"]]
[[f<image skippy.png size="thumbnail"]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; background-color: white; color: black; padding: 1% 1% 1% 1%"]]
@@. . .@@
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]

[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[div class="text-box"]]
**Item #:** SCP-XXXX

**Object Class:** Keter

**Special Containment Procedures:** SCP-XXXX is to be found, then contained inside a 10x10x10 foot cell made of telekill alloy[[span class="blinkbar"]]_[[/span]]

@@ @@

@@ @@

[[div class="outer-chat"]]
[[div class="inner-chat"]]
[[table style="border: none; width: 100%"]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="width: 20%;"]]
[[f<image skippy.png size="thumbnail"]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; background-color: white; color: black; padding: 1% 1% 1% 1%"]]
@@. . .@@
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]

[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[div class="text-box"]]
**Item #:** SCP-XXXX

**Object Class:** Keter

**Special Containment Procedures:** [[span style="background-color: #ffc2b3;"]]SCP-XXXX is to be found, then contained inside a 10x10x10 foot cell made of telekill alloy with twenty guards armed wi[[/span]][[span class="blinkbar"]]_[[/span]]

@@ @@

@@ @@

[[div class="outer-chat"]]
[[div class="inner-chat"]]
[[table style="border: none; width: 100%"]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="width: 20%;"]]
[[f<image skippy.png size="thumbnail"]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; background-color: white; color: black; padding: 1% 1% 1% 1%"]]
It looks like you're still having some problems with your containment procedures here, friend! May I suggest a few changes?
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]

[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[/div]]


@@ @@

[[div class="text-box"]]
**Item #:** SCP-XXXX

**Object Class:** Keter

**Special Containment Procedures:** [[span style="background-color: #ffc2b3;"]]SCP-XXXX is to be found, then contained inside a --10x10x10 foot-- ##blue|standard containment## cell made of telekill alloy with twenty guards armed with AK-47s guarding it.[[/span]]
[[span class="blinkbar"]]_[[/span]]

@@ @@

@@ @@

[[div class="outer-chat"]]
[[div class="inner-chat"]]
[[table style="border: none; width: 100%"]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="width: 20%;"]]
[[f<image skippy.png size="thumbnail"]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; background-color: white; color: black; padding: 1% 1% 1% 1%"]]
Some more things to remember about containment procedures:
* Measurements are written in metric, not imperial. Celsius (not Farenheit), meters (not feet), and liters (not gallons).
* Precise measurements of cells or chambers should not be included unless these dimensions are directly relevant to the anomaly's containment.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]

[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[/div]]


@@ @@

[[div class="text-box"]]
**Item #:** SCP-XXXX

**Object Class:** Keter

**Special Containment Procedures:** [[span style="background-color: #ffc2b3;"]]SCP-XXXX is to be found, then contained inside a standard containment cell --made of telekill alloy-- with --twenty guards armed with AK-47s guarding it-- ##blue|heavily armed guards monitoring it at all times##.[[/span]]

@@**Descri@@[[span class="blinkbar"]]_[[/span]]

@@ @@

@@ @@

[[div class="outer-chat"]]
[[div class="inner-chat"]]
[[table style="border: none; width: 100%"]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="width: 20%;"]]
[[f<image skippy.png size="thumbnail"]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; background-color: white; color: black; padding: 1% 1% 1% 1%"]]
More things to remember:
* Avoid esoteric, exotic, or fictitious materials unless they are critical and/or relevant to the anomaly. This even includes materials such as the Foundation's very own [[[scp-148|telekill]]] alloy!
* Avoid over-the-top or hyperbolic depictions of what measures must be taken to contain an anomaly.

[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]

[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[/div]]


@@ @@

[[div class="text-box"]]
**Item #:** SCP-XXXX

**Object Class:** Keter

**Special Containment Procedures:** SCP-XXXX is to be found, then contained inside a standard containment cell with heavily armed guards monitoring it at all times. [[span style="background-color: #ffc2b3;"]]##blue|Access requires Level-4 authorization or higher.##[[/span]]

**Description:** SCP-XXXX has infe[[span class="blinkbar"]]_[[/span]]

@@ @@

@@ @@

[[div class="outer-chat"]]
[[div class="inner-chat"]]
[[table style="border: none; width: 100%"]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="width: 20%;"]]
[[f<image skippy.png size="thumbnail"]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; background-color: white; color: black; padding: 1% 1% 1% 1%"]]
To help get across the danger of your anomaly, I've added something mentioning that access to it requires Level-4 authorization or higher. Now, regarding your anomaly's description -- 

[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]

[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[/div]]


@@ @@

[[div class="text-box"]]
**Item #:** SCP-XXXX

**Object Class:** Keter

**Special Containment Procedures:** SCP-XXXX is to be found, then contained inside a standard containment cell with heavily armed guards monitoring it at all times. Access requires Level-4 authorization or higher.

**Description:** SCP-XXXX has infected everything, everyone. Only a few of us are [[span class="blinkbar"]]_[[/span]]

@@ @@

@@ @@

**Item #:** SCP-XXXX

**Object Class:** Keter

**Special Containment Procedures:** SCP-XXXX is to be found, then contained inside a standard containment cell with heavily armed guards monitoring it at all times. Access requires Level-4 authorization or higher.

**Description:** [[span style="background-color: #ffc2b3;"]]It appears to be some sort of infectious program emitted from one of the terminals, but we don[[/span]][[span class="blinkbar"]]_[[/span]]

@@ @@

[[div class="outer-chat"]]
[[div class="inner-chat"]]
[[table style="border: none; width: 100%"]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="width: 20%;"]]
[[f<image skippy.png size="thumbnail"]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; background-color: white; color: black; padding: 1% 1% 1% 1%"]]
Some things to remember about Descriptions:
* They're intended to provide a succinct explanation of what the anomaly is, how it works, and what is important about it.
* Like containment procedures, they should be brief, but interesting enough for personnel to remember them!
* Avoid needless adverb-ing ('primarily', 'generally') and phrases like 'appears to be' or 'some sort of'. Be precise, not vague!

Also, sorry about the @@fanfiction.net@@ snipe back there, chum. Just got a little frustrated, y'know? 
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]

[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[/div]]

It modifies everything we say, write, and even thi[[span class="blinkbar"]]_[[/span]]
